io.brooklyn.maven.mojo

Class StartBrooklynMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.brooklyn.maven.mojo.AbstractBrooklynMojo
        • io.brooklyn.maven.mojo.StartBrooklynMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="start-server",
      defaultPhase=PRE_INTEGRATION_TEST,
      configurator="include-project-dependencies",
      requiresDependencyResolution=TEST)
public class StartBrooklynMojo
extends AbstractBrooklynMojo
    Run a Brooklyn server.
